LightningComponentBundle.description: Action card with colored header, icon, description, button, and link. Use for permission/service selection pages. Place inside Ontario DS Action Card Collection for proper grid layout.

property.name: icon
property.label: Icon URL
property.description: URL to the icon image displayed in the header bar. Use a static resource URL.

property.name: iconAltText
property.label: Icon alt text
property.description: Alternative text for the icon (for accessibility). Leave empty if icon is decorative.

property.name: heading
property.label: Heading
property.description: Card title displayed in the colored header bar.

property.name: headerColour
property.label: Header colour
property.description: Background color of the header bar.

property.name: description
property.label: Description
property.description: Description text below the header. Supports Markdown.
property.default: Description of the action or service.

property.name: buttonLabel
property.label: Button label
property.description: Text for the primary action button.

property.name: buttonUrl
property.label: Button URL
property.description: URL the button navigates to when clicked.

property.name: linkLabel
property.label: Link label
property.description: Text for the optional secondary link (e.g., 'More information').

property.name: className
property.label: Class name
property.description: Additional CSS class to apply to the card.
